cells.data:
Radius of one gear $R_1$. Radius of second gera $R_2$. Assume $R_1 > R_2$. Let the distance between their centers by $L$.

Total length = $2 \pi R_1 + 2 arccos \biggr(\frac{R_1-R_2}{L}\biggr)(R_2 - R_1) + 2 \sqrt{L^2 - (R_1 - R_2)^2}$

Total length 1: 415 mm
L = ~ 117 mm

Total length 2: 1025 mm
L = ~ 424 mm
